title: Build Lucene Javadocs as a standalone artifact for Solr users
description:
Solr relies on a lot of Lucene packages. Some of the classes (e.g. Tokenizers) have a lot of documentation in the Javadoc. 

However, the JavaDoc shipped with Solr only covers Solr specific classes. And full Lucene download is rather large (50M) to get them just for JavaDocs.

It would be useful to have a separate download of just Lucene Javadocs for those people who want/need to work offline and want to have all the relevant documentation.

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: Javadocs will be online and Solr Javadocs already cross-link into Lucene Javadocs, so they will be together.
